title: Depositing of defined ALSPAC data sets with the UK Survey Archive
abstractText:
ALSPAC has been collecting data relating to its cohort since 1990.  Social Science use of this resource has been limited, and this project is part of an effort to ensure better relevance to this research community.  Initially, six datasets will be deposited with the UK Archive.  The topics addressed are:

   1. Household composition
   2. Neighbourhood
   3. Housing
   4. Other socio-economic factors
   5. Child’s heights
   6. Occupation and employment


One focus of this project is to code text variables.  This includes the large amount of longitudinal data relating to parental occupation.  This coding process will be of great interest to the social science community.
This project is the second phase – the first being a feasibility review of the project’s intended purpose.  The production and delivery to UK Archive of the actual datasets is the aim of this study.
